quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Miracle and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, actor, opening. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the movie Miracle, the U.S. team beat the second ranked team in the world. Which nation was this?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Czechoslovakia

questions.question: Which year and in which city did the events the movie Miracle was based on took place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1980 - Lake Placid, U.S.A

questions.question: Coach Herb Brooks tragically lost his life after the filming of the movie Miracle, in which he was a consultant.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This 1988 drama movie, starring Meryl Streep, follows the real-life case of Azaria Chamberlain, a baby who disappeared in 1980.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Cry in the Dark

questions.question: Which Hollywood actress appeared in the 1961 movie Judgment at Nuremberg?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marlene Dietrich

questions.question: Which of these actors starred in Rob Reiners 1992 movie A Few Good Men?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Nicholson

questions.question: In the movie Miracle, following a tie in an exhibition game in Norway, coach Herb Brooks got very angry by the attitude and poor showing of his players and decided to punish them. What was the punishment?

options.text: He made them crawl hands and knees on the ice up and down 5 times.
He made them play 2 ten-minute halves amongst themselves.
He gave them a severe tongue lashing whilst making them watch the replay.
He made them do a punishing running drill and chastised them until they could barely walk.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He made them do a punishing running drill and chastised them until they could barely walk.

questions.question: Was Kurt Russel the actor that played the part of the U.S. head coach in the movie Miracle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: U.S. hockey star Buzz Schneider was played by his own son in the movie Miracle.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the movie Miracle, what causes Rob McClanahan and Jack O’Callahan to have a fight during an early practice?

options.text: They were trying to impress Herb Brooks.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An old college rivalry

questions.question: For what did Brooks thank the player he cut just before the start of the Olympics in the movie Miracle?

options.text: For giving him a lift to practice
For giving him his very best
For taking the decision like a man

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: For giving him his very best

questions.question: What 1982 courtroom drama movie stars Paul Newman as alcoholic lawyer Frank Galvin.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Verdict

questions.question: In the movie Miracle, at the opening game of the Olympics,  the U.S. team plays the third ranked team in the world and scores a last-minute goal to snatch a tie. Which was the nation the U.S. team played against?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sweden

questions.question: Early in the movie Miracle, at the opening practice, how does coach Herb Brooks upset the U.S. ice hockey officials?

options.text: By not showing up to practice
By bringing his wife to training
By already picking the squad of 26 players he wanted with no consultation from them
By refusing to pick a selectors son

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: By already picking the squad of 26 players he wanted with no consultation from them

questions.question: In the movie Miracle, coach Herb Brooks had to cut a player just before the start of the Olympics. Who was the unfortunate player?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ralph Cox

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Butch Cassidy and Sundance Kid

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dustin Hoffman

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thomas Jefferson

questions.question: How do you say, This is a robbery in Spanish?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Este es un robo

questions.question: What is the name of the character voiced by Tom Hanks in the Toy Story movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Woody

questions.question: Where are Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid when the mayor is trying organize a group to get out and kill them?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: On a balcony watching

questions.question: What country are Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid trying to get to throughout the self-titled movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bolivia

questions.question: What character did Danny DeVito voice in the 1997 animated movie Hercules?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Philoctetes

questions.question: What year was Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1969

questions.question: Why does the Sundance Kid not jump off the cliff into the water to escape inevitable death in the western film Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He cant swim.

questions.question: The Sundance Kid is better at shooting when hes moving.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What actress voiced Princess Fiona in the Shrek movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cameron Diaz

questions.question: What actress voiced Judge Bumbleton in the 2007 animated movie Bee Movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oprah Winfrey

questions.question: Steve McQueen was originally offered one of the starring roles in Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: I decided to take the fate of human kind into my own hands. My rationale for the murders is to show people what the world is, as well as punish the wicked. I know I will be remembered for my work and people will thank me for ridding the world of those who commit sins.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Charlie and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, leader, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these bands is featured on the soundtrack of the Transformers 2 movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Linkin Park

questions.question: Why did Willy Wonka decide to become a candy maker according to the 2005 movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory?

options.text: Because he was obese as a child and was not allowed to eat candy
Because he loved the smell of chocolate
Because his father forbade him to eat candy

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because his father forbade him to eat candy

questions.question: What is the name of the leader of the evil Decepticons in Transformers 2?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Fallen

questions.question: What word does Willy Wonka find difficult to pronounce and starts stuttering every time he tries to utter it in the 2005 movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Parents

questions.question: What amazing invention does Willy Wonka create in the 2005 movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory?

options.text: Chewing gum for making giant balloons
Chewing gum that does not lose its flavor

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What color was Leroys Glow at the end of the movie The Last Dragon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: gold

questions.question: What is the color of Willy Wonkas gloves that he wears all the time in the 2005 movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Purple

questions.question: Movie producer Lorenzo di Bonaventura compared the master of Megatron from Transformers 2 to what notable historical person?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Judas Iscariot

questions.question: What is the name of the tiny new workers in Willy Wonkas factory in te 2005 movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oompa-Loompas

questions.question: What does the obese German boy reply to his mother when she tells him to stop eating himself in the 2005 movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory?

options.text: I cant hear you, I have chocolate in my ears!
Nobody can tell me what to do!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: But I taste so good!

questions.question: What is the name of the communications specialist of Megatron in Transformers 2?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Soundwave

questions.question: What did Charlies grandpa do when the little boy showed him the golden ticked he found in the candy bar in the 2005 movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He started dancing.

questions.question: What actor was considered for the role of Willy Wonka in the 2005 movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, before it was given to Johnny Depp?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What does Willy Wonka want from Charlie in order to make him the heir of his factory in Charlie and the Chocolate Factory 2005?

options.text: To find and kill Willys father
To resign himself to eating only chocolate for the rest of his life

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To give up his family

questions.question: Why did Willy Wonka fire all of his workers, including Charlies grandpa, in the 2005 movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory?

options.text: He accused them of being lazy.
He hated to see people around him.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was afraid of spies.
